name: nigelchaos
text: And there is only one winner in a basketball game. EVER.

name: soticoto
text:
My gall bladder loves crime.
My liver is as yet undecided.

name: dusty
text: There are certain types of crime that the rectum hates as well. But this statement is still valid because they are very specific types of crime, and it only hates them while they are occurring, because it has no memory or foresight.

name: soticoto
text: My liver has since concluded it hates drunken crime... because it resents having to work while the rest of me is playing.

Not to mention the "Hail Mary, full of grace," intro.

Frankly, I thought the prayer was revolutionary. Philippe must have been seized by the inspiration of the holy spirit. And of uncle Sam.

name: lastlarf
text:
It has always been clear that the characters know they are in a comic strip. See the strip at the start of the Ray In Hell story arc, where Teodor is telling Ray about what will happen in the next story.

Ray adressed this once in Ray's Place I think as well.

name: hexjumper
text: I think that what's going on in that strip is that Onstad is portraying his characters as actors - it's a momentary fourth-wall breaking moment in which the characters know that they're in a story and know what's coming next, since they'll be acting in it. Overall, though, I think that 99.5% of the strips portray the characters as unaware that they're in a comic strip.

name: malesherbez
text:
I think the idea is that everything is real and happening, but Chris Onstad is there to record it happening
or something like that

name: clockworkorange
text: This is the theory that appeals most to me.

They do break the fourth wall all the time though, I realise. Also, who cares about canon in Achewood.

Onstad probably isn't going to kill this thing because of a few idiots who have no life. It's not that hard to adjust the number of lames to filter out shit like this.

Seriously, you hate this so much that instead of opting to simply not view it, you want it down?

You are a sad person. I'm sorry for you. :(

name: someone3
text:
TO define the word Zeke for those who are not tough guys like roast beef;

Zeke:

1. Zero Electron Kinetic Energy (honest)

2.n. A biblical name, short for Ezekial.

3.n. A hayseed or other unsophisticated person.

4.n. An extremely cool person, especially on the dance floor.

guess which on Ray is...
